pageContent: Background: High-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) is an emerging treatment for select patients with localized prostate cancer (PCa).

metaData.source:
Non-Whole-Gland High-Intensity Focused Ultrasound vs Whole-Gland High-Intensity Focused Ultrasound for Management of Localized Prostate Cancer: 1-Year Oncological and Functional Outcomes
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30526029/
